divs: Sighting DetailsIM OUT WORKING ON A RIG ON GALVAN RD, ME AND MY FELLOW CO-WORKERS(7 WORKERS) HAVE SEEN BRIGHT ORANGE LIGHTS IN PACKS OF 2, 5, AND 1 IN THE LAST 3 NIGHTS, FINALLY WE WATCHED ONE TONIGHT FOR ABOUT 4 MINUTES APPEARING AND DISSAPPEARING ACROSS THE SKY STAYING IN ONE PLACE FOR ABOUT 13 SECONDS, THEN WE NOTICED 3 PLANES WITH FLASHING LIGHTS CHASING THIS OBJECT ALL ACROSS THE SKY, CIRCLING BACK AND FORTH AS IF THE UFO WAS PLAYING WITH THEM. IT WOULD APPEAR THEN THEY WOULD CHASE IT, THEN IT WOULD APPEAR SOMEWHERE ELSE. THEN FINALLY WE SEEN A SWOOP OF THE UFO WITH A BRIGHT WHITE FLASH BEHIND IT SWOOPING THROUGH THE SKY. MORE THEN ONE PERSON SEEN THIS HAPPEN SO SOMETHING IS GOING ON. IM FROM OHIO AND HAVE NEVER SEEN OR BELIEVED IN UFO'S TILL TONIGHT, I BET OTHER PEOPLE ARE SEEING THESE GROUPS OF BRIGHT ORANGE LIGHTS IN THE SKY. EMAIL ME BACK AND LET ME KNOW IF YOU GET ANY MORE REPORTINGS OF THIS ,I'LL KEEP AN EYE OUT. WERE GONNA TRY TO GET A PICTURE OF THIS TOMMOROW NIGHT BECAUSE THEY SHOW UP EVERY NIGHT AROUND 830.THANKS
trends: There have been no other sightings in Encinal
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright orange lights North of encinal, White swoop through air
